oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Portrait of Major John Buchanan
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Portrait of Major John Buchanan, an early Tennessee settler and founder of Buchanan's Station on Mill Creek near its confluence with the Cumberland River in Nashville. Buchanan was a contemporary of James Robertson and the great-grandfather of Governor John Price Buchanan.
Hangs in the Pioneer Room of the Tennessee State Museum.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Buchanan, John A., 1759-1832
Portraits; Buchanan family;
